body.p: I will try to explain how I downloaded my Oxygen editor on my device. First, I typed in the link and entered it.
I entered my email, name and school. I chose the trial option for academic use. Then I chose the author option. Afterwards, I opened my book from week 11 homework via ditamap manager.
Now I will save my book, add it to my local and then cloud github accounts, and then push it to winter2024 github account.
